import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import { Grid, Button } from "@material-ui/core"; import { Desciptor, ServiceBidModal } from "../../molecules"; import { BookingProcess } from "../../organisms"; import { ListIcons } from "../../../resources/icons"; import { useFetch, FETCHSTATES } from "../../../hooks"; import { BasicLayout } from "../../layout"; import "./index.scss"; const { ping_drop, start_half, text_snippet } = ListIcons; export const ServiceDetailScreen = (props) => { const id = props?.match?.params?.id; const [data, status, error] = useFetch(`services/${id}`); const [isBidding, setIsBidding] = useState(false); const [isBooking, setIsBooking] = useState(false); const service = status !== FETCHSTATES.loading && status ? data.service : {}; if (error) console.log("error, should return an error message", error); return ( setIsBooking(false)} />

{service?.name}

{service?.user?.name}

{service?.longDescription}

 $50.00

Detalles

 ); };
